fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 93.50 points or 0.48% to settle at 19,528.80. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slipped 3.54% to 10.96. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and Kotak Mahindra Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The September 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 28 September 2023.
